answers.answer: Oh my gosh, I have 20/20 vision but when I'm pregnant my eyes are super sore and just painful and blurry as ever! So I honestly have glasses for when I'm pregnant. Lol. It's just so funny how pregnancy can make your eyes go all crazy. You are not alone. :)
It means your blood pressure is high, do you have head aches?

While it can mean gestational diabetes or preeclampsia, it's also normal to have vision changes during pregnancy. Just watch for any spots in your vision cause that can be high blood pressure(what I have now). Bring it up to your doctor, but no, it doesn't always mean something is wrong!

Oh and I've never had any problems with diabetes while pregnant or any other time in my life. It's just pregnancy, its one of the many side effects. Don't worry about it too much . Just go to the appt and see what's up. Both my ob and eye doctor said it's all due to pregnancy. :)

My eyes are like that too especially when I wake up in the morning my right eye be really blurry and I wear glasses so I went to the eye doctor and they said it just be a coat over your eye but I had to switch glasses u not the only 1
Thanks ladies! I hope it's nothing serious like diabetes! Thanks for all the positive feedbacks! I hope its just really part of pregnancy! Thanks again! :)

question: I mean my right eye is kinda blurry. Theres nothing wrong with my left one but yeah I'm worried. I already made appt with optometry but I wanna at least know if I'm not the only one. I'm so scared I looked it up and some says it cud be one of the signs of having diabetes....
title: anyone knows if having blurry eyes or eye normal in pegnancy?
